meanings.definition: A dish of minced meat, game, or poultry, usually served in a rich sauce.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious salmi for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The salmi at the restaurant was full of flavor and tender meat.
meanings.sent3: As a joke, he tried to serve a salmi to his pet cat, who looked confused.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the salmi filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The rich sauce in the salmi was so tasty, it left a lasting impression on the guests.

meanings.definition: A stew made from game or poultry, typically flavored with wine and mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The hearty salmi warmed them up on the cold winter evening.
meanings.sent2: She learned to cook a delicious salmi with the perfect blend of wine and mushrooms.
meanings.sent3: The salmi was so good that even the pickiest eater asked for seconds.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the salmi danced on her taste buds like a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the salmi cooking on the stove was irresistible, drawing everyone to the kitchen.
